name: Zippy
text:
Zippy
Zippy was a stable worker in the employ of the Broken Circle Stables.
He took care of Troy, a pony gifted to Laura Palmer and offered to make a nameplate for Troy and gave Laura a sugar cube to feed to the pony.
On November 10, 1984, Zippy gave directions to Laura, who had planned on riding Troy to 1400 River Road.
